title: BRIEF-Christopher & Banks Corp Announces Signing Of Corporate Headquarters Sale-Leaseback Agreement
text:
April 23, 2018 / 10:40 AM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Christopher & Banks Corp Announces Signing Of Corporate Headquarters Sale-Leaseback Agreement Reuters Staff 
April 23 (Reuters) - Christopher & Banks Corp: 
* CHRISTOPHER & BANKS CORPORATION ANNOUNCES SIGNING OF CORPORATE HEADQUARTERS SALE-LEASEBACK AGREEMENT 
* CHRISTOPHER & BANKS - PURCHASE AGREEMENT WITH PRIVATE, UNAFFILIATED INVESTOR GROUP TO SELL, LEASE BACK PLYMOUTH HEADQUARTERS FOR $13.65 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
